data.message: Lol. Man this dude simply wishing happy birthday. Lmao. All these dumb ass comments going way beyond the video of a simple happy birthday. Dang it man. The hate is real. Long live hate and racism in the world but especially in the USA. Dang it man.

replies.message: You nailed it dude. If people can't rip apart someone's skin color they will rip apart his facial hair/age etc. Makes me sad for the world, cause it's literally 1000s of the same comments about Nothing to actually do with this post.✌
